title: PropertyX – Smart Real Estate App
description: A modern Android app for property listings and management. PropertyX allows users to browse, post, and manage real estate with real-time updates using Firebase. Features include authentication, image uploads, and a clean UI for both agents and buyers.

title: DepressionGuru – Mental Health Platform
description: A supportive web app where users can anonymously share their struggles and receive guidance from others. Built with Flask, SQLite, and a mysterious yet calming UI. Prioritizes privacy and human connection for mental wellness.

title: Blogy – Headless Blog CMS
description: A minimal yet powerful CMS to create and manage blogs directly from your browser. Supports Markdown parsing, live preview, and dynamic content generation using SvelteKit. Fast, secure, and easily deployable.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio designed using SvelteKit and TailwindCSS, showcasing my work, skills, and contact.
